bibl.title: English translation [from Spanish] of letter from Sebastian Lorente to Frederick F. Russell, July 5, 1925 [Enclosed in C0309004]

div1.p: Lorente sends a copy of a letter that disproves the rumors about the existence of yellow fever in Peru.

div1.head: English translation [from Spanish] of letter from Sebastian Lorente to Frederick F. Russell, July 5, 1925 [Enclosed in C0309004]
div1.opener:
COPY.
Translated from the Spanish, HRM
7-24-25
HRM
DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC HEALTH
Lima
Lima,
July 5, 1925
Dr. F.F. Russell
Rockefeller Foundation
New York City
My dear Dr. Russell:
div1.p:
It is a pleasure, for me to send you a copy of the
communication sent by my office to Dr. Wenceslao Pareja, Director
of Public Health of Ecuador.

The content of this communication will prove to you once
more the falseness of the rumor spread on the existence of yellow
fever in the northern part of Peru.
